============================================
core/dpi/import
============================================

import "DPI-C" context function int foo(string bar);

----

(source_file
  (dpi_import_export
    (dpi_spec_string)
    (dpi_function_import_property)
    (dpi_function_proto
      (function_prototype
        (data_type_or_void
          (data_type
            (integer_atom_type)))
        name: (simple_identifier)
        (tf_port_list
          (tf_port_item
            (data_type_or_implicit
              (data_type))
            name: (simple_identifier)))))))
